metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Caralee Grollo - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group3_Prisoner3 06d864d4-924a-4595-8155-d96df5b5f97e - (40; 39; 52)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Caralee Grollo
0.text: What they were doing with us was... horrid. Thank you for saving me.

1.speaker: Caralee Grollo
1.text: I can't believe they'd use me to control Droo... my poor, sweet wee lad.
